name: partty
title: ParTTY
description: Pseudo terminals for Node.js, with smart defaults

scripts.preinstall: ( node -e "process.exit(process.platform === 'win32' ? 0 : 1);" && (pushd .git 2>NUL && popd || git init) && git submodule update --init --recursive ) || echo "Submodule is not required as you are not running on Windows."
